tool.name: BuildGlossary

param.name: glossaryTable
param.displayname: Excel Table with Master List of Terms and Definitions:
param.dialogReference: A master excel table with three columns "Term", "Definition", and DefinitionSourceID

param.name: exampleBlankGlossaryTable
param.dialogReference: A correctly formatted Glossary table. Note: We created this using the GeMS "Create New Database" tool. The script removes and row in the table before starting; it empties out a copy and then starts refilling it.

tool.summary: This tool builds a Glossary table from all the unique Type, IdentityConfidence, ScientificConfidence, ParagraphyStyle, and AgeUnit entries in the GDB and a master table.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool builds a Glossary table from all the unique Type, IdentityConfidence, ScientificConfidence, ParagraphyStyle, and AgeUnit entries in the GDB and a master table.
